statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE campaign_id = 100;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 500;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE impressions < 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC, conversions ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY impressions ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, clicks FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE clicks > 50 AND conversions < 5 ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-02-15' AND '2022-03-15' AND impressions > 500 ORDER BY clicks DESC, conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date, clicks FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE end_date < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC, clicks ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, marketing_channel FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, spend FROM campaign_performance WHERE spend > 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, marketing_channel FROM campaigns WHERE marketing_channel = 'Social Media' ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions), SUM(clicks) FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, spend FROM campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_performance ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id WHERE spend > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, impressions, revenue FROM ad_performance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT age_group, gender, location FROM audience_demographics WHERE campaign_id = 101 ORDER BY age_group, gender;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT campaign_name, budget, engagement_rate FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM ad_performance WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM campaigns INNER JOIN ad_performance ON campaigns.campaign_id = ad_performance.campaign_id WHERE ad_performance.conversions > 50 ORDER BY ad_performance.impressions ASC
SELECT * FROM campaigns JOIN audience_demographics ON campaigns.campaign_id = audience_demographics.campaign_id WHERE audience_demographics.gender = 'Female' ORDER BY campaigns.start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM past_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, total_clicks FROM past_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_spent FROM past_campaigns WHERE total_spent > 5000;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM marketing_channels;
SELECT campaign_name, total_spent, total_clicks FROM past_campaigns WHERE total_clicks > 1000 AND total_spent < 5000;
SELECT * FROM past_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_clicks ASC
SELECT campaign_name, total_spent FROM past_campaigns WHERE total_spent > 5000
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM past_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT pc.campaign_name, cp.impressions, cp.conversions FROM past_campaigns pc JOIN campaign_performance cp ON pc.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id
SELECT mc.channel_name, cc.campaign_id FROM marketing_channels mc JOIN campaign_channels cc ON mc.channel_id = cc.channel_id
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM campaigns;
SELECT channel_name, impressions, clicks FROM channels WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT channel_name, budget FROM channels ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segments;
